text: Anama hige'za ete Ra Anumzamofontega zavi krafa hu'za ana zankura zamasunku nehu'za anage hu'naze, tagra kumi huta Ra Anumzana atreta tamefi hunemita, Ba'ali havi anumzane, Astaroti havi anumzamofo amema'are monora hunteta eri'zana erinte'none. Hagi menina tagu'vazinka ha' vahetimofo zamazampintira tavaregeta kagritera monora huneganteta erizanka'a erigantamaneno.
